nodes.text: The Sedratis system was located in the Arrowhead, a region in the Slice portion of the Core Worlds. It was situated on the super-hyperroute known as the Corellian Run, between the Rehemsa and Namaryne systems. The Sedratis system contained Sedratis City, which in turn was the site of the Sedratis Coliseum.
The Sedratis system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square M-11.
